channel.title: How would I make an ItemOnItem or ItemOnObject Packet?

item.title: How would I make an ItemOnItem or ItemOnObject Packet?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Title says most of it…
Heres a sample packet from my base…

[code]package server.players.packets;

import server.util.;
import server.players.;

/**

  • Click Object
    */
    public class ClickObject implements PacketType {

    public static final int FIRST_CLICK = 132, SECOND_CLICK = 252, THIRD_CLICK = 70;
    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    c.clickObjectType = c.objectX = c.objectId = c.objectY = 0;
    switch(packetType) {

     	case FIRST_CLICK:
 	c.objectX = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA();
 	c.objectId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
 	c.objectY = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
 	
 	switch(c.objectId) {
 		default:
 		c.objectDistance = 1;
 		c.objectXOffset = 0;
 		c.objectYOffset = 0;
 		break;
 		
 	}
 	if(c.goodDistance(c.objectX+c.objectXOffset, c.objectY+c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) {
 		c.getActions().firstClickObject(c.objectId);
 	} else {
 		c.clickObjectType = 1;
 	}
 	break;
 	
 	case SECOND_CLICK:
 	c.objectId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
 	c.objectY = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
 	c.objectX = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
 	
 	switch(c.objectId) {
 		default:
 		c.objectDistance = 1;
 		c.objectXOffset = 0;
 		c.objectYOffset = 0;
 		break;
 		
 	}
 	if(c.goodDistance(c.objectX+c.objectXOffset, c.objectY+c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) { 
 		c.getActions().secondClickObject(c.objectId);
 	} else {
 		c.clickObjectType = 2;
 	}
 	break;
 	
 	case THIRD_CLICK:
 	c.objectX = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
 	c.objectY = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord();
 	c.objectId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
 	switch(c.objectId) {
 		default:
 		c.objectDistance = 1;
 		c.objectXOffset = 0;
 		c.objectYOffset = 0;
 		break;		
 	}
 	if(c.goodDistance(c.objectX+c.objectXOffset, c.objectY+c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) { 
 		c.getActions().secondClickObject(c.objectId);
 	} else {
 		c.clickObjectType = 3;
 	}	
 	break;
 }

    }

}
[/code]

And one more if it helps…

[code]package server.players.packets;

import server.util.;
import server.players.;

/**

  • Clicking an item, bury bone, eat food etc
    **/
    public class ClickItem implements PacketType {

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    int junk = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA();
    int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
    int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
    if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) {
    return;
    }

     switch(itemId) {
 	case 1891: // cake
 	c.getPA().eatFood(4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 1893: // 2/3 cake
 	c.getPA().eatFood(4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 1895: // 1/4 cake
 	c.getPA().eatFood(4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 2309: // bread
 	c.getPA().eatFood(2, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 1901: // 1/4 choc cake
 	c.getPA().eatFood(5, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;

 	case 315: // shrimp
 	c.getPA().eatFood(3, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 		
 	case 355: // mackerel
 	c.getPA().eatFood(6, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 339: // cod
 	c.getPA().eatFood(7, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;	
 				
 	case 333: // trout
 	c.getPA().eatFood(7, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 				
 	case 351: // pike
 	c.getPA().eatFood(8, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;	
 	
 	case 329: // salmon
 	c.getPA().eatFood(9, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 			
 	case 361: // tuna
 	c.getPA().eatFood(10, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 379: // lobster
 	c.getPA().eatFood(12, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 365: // bass
 	c.getPA().eatFood(13, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 373: // swordfish
 	c.getPA().eatFood(14, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 385:
 	c.getPA().eatFood(20, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;
 	
 	case 391: // manta
 	c.getPA().eatFood(22, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;

 	case 2434: // Prayer Potion (4)
 	c.getPA().PrayerPot(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) / 4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;

 	case 139: // Prayer Potion (3)
 	c.getPA().PrayerPot(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) / 4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;


 	case 141: // Prayer Potion (2)
 	c.getPA().PrayerPot(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) / 4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;


 	case 143: // Prayer Potion (1)
 	c.getPA().PrayerPot(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) / 4, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
 	break;

    /**

    • Bone Burying
      **/
      case 526:
      c.getPA().buryBone(5, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
      break;

        case 532:
  c.getPA().buryBone(10, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
  break;
  
  case 536:
  c.getPA().buryBone(15, 1600, itemId, itemSlot);
  break;

    /**

    • Herb ID’ing
      **/

    case 199:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 1) { // identifying guam
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(3, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(199, c.getItems().getItemSlot(199), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the guam leaf.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(249, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 1) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 3 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 201:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 5) { // identifying marrentill
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(4, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(201, c.getItems().getItemSlot(201), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the marrentill.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(251, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 5) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 5 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 203:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 11) { // identifying tarromin
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(5, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(203, c.getItems().getItemSlot(203), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the tarromin.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(253, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 11) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 11 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 205:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 20) { // identifying harralander
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(6, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(205, c.getItems().getItemSlot(205), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the harralander.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(255, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 20) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 20 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 207:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 25) { // identifying ranarr
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(8, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(207, c.getItems().getItemSlot(207), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the ranarr weed.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(257, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 25) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 25 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 209:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 30) { // identifying toadflax
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(8, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(209, c.getItems().getItemSlot(209), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the toadflax.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(2998, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 30) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 30 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 211:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 40) { // identifying irit
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(9, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(211, c.getItems().getItemSlot(211), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the irit.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(259, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 40) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 40 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 213:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 48) { // identifying avantoe
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(10, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(213, c.getItems().getItemSlot(213), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the avantoe.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(261, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 48) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 48 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 215:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 54) { // identifying kwuarm
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(11, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(215, c.getItems().getItemSlot(215), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the kwuarm.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(263, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 54) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 54 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 217:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 59) { // identifying snapdragon
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(12, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(217, c.getItems().getItemSlot(217), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the snapdragon.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(3000, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 59) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 59 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 219:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 65) { // identifying cadantine
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(13, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(219, c.getItems().getItemSlot(219), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the cadantine.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(265, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 65) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 65 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 1531:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 67) { // identifying Lantadyme
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(14, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(1531, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1531), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the lantadyme.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(2481, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 67) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 67 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 1533:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 75) { // identifying Tortsol
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(16, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(1533, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1533), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the torstol.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(269, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 75) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 75 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;
    case 1529:
    if (c.playerLevel[15] >= 70) { // identifying Dwarf Weed
    c.getPA().addSkillXP(15, 15);
    c.getItems().deleteItem(1529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(1529), 1);
    c.sendMessage(“You clean the dirt from the dwarf weed.”);
    c.getItems().addItem(267, 1);
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(15);
    } else if (c.playerLevel[15] < 70) {
    c.sendMessage(“You cannot clean this herb. You need an Herblore level of 70 to attempt this.”);
    }
    break;

     }

    }

}
[/code]

Help would be appreciated…
Thanks, Moose
